sources.title: Lucky Larrigan (1932) REX BELL Cowboy Western
sources.description:
1st Time on YouTube!
Starring Rex Bell, Cecilia Parker, Robert Kortman, George Hayes
Director: Harry L. Fraser

Half a million dollars has been stolen, but only prison inmate Dutch knows where it is. So Secret Service agent Joe "Lefty" Keyes goes deep undercover and is sent to prison. His intent is to bust Dutch out of the big house and find the stolen fortune.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: Typical of the Trem Carr-produced Monogram westerns starring Rex Bell, this one opens in the East with Craig Larrigan as a polo-playing playboy who has no use for the West nor the western way of life. Rancher Jess Bailey, accompanied by his daughter Virginia, comes east to get his eastern-business partner John Larrigan to advance him more money to keep their rustler-plagued ranch afloat, and Craig and Virginia strike up a romance, which is going nowhere fast because of his elitist attitude. The contrived motivation to get the Bell character out west makes less sense than usual, and the incidents that follow carry no logic either.
metadata.Actors: Rex Bell, Helen Foster, Stanley Blystone
